channel.title: 2 Problems to get fixed [REWARDING]
channel.description:
I have two things that I want to get fixed on my server, one of them is a short double XP potion, this will change the XP multiplier to the double for X hours, the other problem, is, my Skills tab doesn't have the XP Hovers working properly, they appear in wrong coordiaties, I will reward people who fix this, add me on skype or msn: Msn: Duerdum9@hotmail.com Skype: duerdum9
These are 1 Client and 1 Server so I posted them in both places!
